channel.title: 2008-01-08 00:00:00 +0000 UTC on Srikanth Perinkulam
channel.description: Recent content in 2008-01-08 00:00:00 +0000 UTC on Srikanth Perinkulam

item.title: Ahaieeen hoon!
item.description: A 3 month Karate class is going to be held in campus starting Feb 1st.  Given my ambidextrous  flexibility and reflexive fists I would have made a wonderful karate kid ( ahem  ahem … Professional :-) ). How I wish I could join it ! Had I not payed the 3 grand for my French classes I would have as well been into this. Anyways, gotta see if I can talk with the coach and join a month late. Amends can be made ! :-)

item.title: Who says Wine ain't smooth!!!
item.description: Just installed WIne on Ubuntu a few minutes back. Installed a couple of other windows based softwares too! Now they really work :-) . Haggard installations are now things of the past. Probably it’s time I move over to something more challenging.
